tickets.title: Update homepage hero section
tickets.body: The hero image is not responsive on mobile devices. Hyrule Castle background appears pixelated. Need to optimize for faster loading times and ensure all call-to-action buttons are functioning properly.

tickets.title: Database connection timeout
tickets.body: Users are experiencing intermittent timeouts when querying the Triforce database. Issue occurs primarily during peak hours. Requires investigation into connection pooling and query optimization.

tickets.title: Add dark mode toggle
tickets.body: Users have requested a dark mode option for the application. Should include theme persistence and system preference detection. CSS variables need to be updated throughout.

tickets.title: Fix mobile navigation menu
tickets.body: The hamburger menu does not open on iOS Safari version 15. Dropdown items are not accessible via screen readers. Requires ARIA attribute fixes and JavaScript adjustments.

tickets.title: Update copyright year in footer
tickets.body: The footer still shows 2023 copyright. Needs to be updated to 2024 dynamically or via configuration file.

tickets.title: Implement user profile upload
tickets.body: Users need ability to upload profile pictures. Feature requires image validation, compression, and storage integration with Cloudinary or similar service.

tickets.title: Email notification system failing
tickets.body: Password reset and ticket update emails are not being sent. SMTP configuration appears correct but no emails are logged in the outgoing queue.

tickets.title: Optimize image loading
tickets.body: Large images on product pages are affecting Core Web Vitals. Need to implement lazy loading and convert images to WebP format for supported browsers.

tickets.title: Add pagination to user list
tickets.body: Admin panel user list loads all records at once causing performance issues. Need server-side pagination with page size options (10, 25, 50, 100).

tickets.title: Broken API endpoint /api/tickets
tickets.body: GET request to /api/tickets returns 500 error when filtering by priority. Issue appears to be in the SQL query construction when priority parameter is null.

tickets.title: Improve form validation messages
tickets.body: Current validation errors are not user-friendly. Need clearer messages with field-specific instructions and proper color coding (red for errors, green for success).

tickets.title: Update dependencies to latest versions
tickets.body: Several packages have security vulnerabilities according to npm audit. React needs updating from v17 to v18, and Express from v4 to v5 with appropriate breaking change adjustments.

tickets.title: Implement two-factor authentication
tickets.body: Add 2FA option for user accounts using TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password). Should include backup codes and recovery options for lost devices.

tickets.title: Fix console warnings
tickets.body: Multiple React key warnings and deprecated API usage messages in console. Need to clean up before next production deployment.

tickets.title: Add search functionality to docs
tickets.body: Documentation pages need full-text search capability. Consider implementing Algolia or client-side search with lunr.js.

tickets.title: Browser compatibility issues
tickets.body: CSS Grid layout breaks in Internet Explorer 11. Need fallback using flexbox or feature detection with @supports rule.

tickets.title: Setup automated testing pipeline
tickets.body: Implement CI/CD with GitHub Actions to run unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests on every pull request to main branch.
